blueprint.description: Installs VirtualBox on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [VirtualBox](https://www.virtualbox.org/) is a free and open-source hosted hypervisor for x86 virtualization, developed by Oracle Corporation. Created by Innotek, it was acquired by Sun Microsystems in 2008, which was in turn acquired by Oracle in 2010. VirtualBox may be installed on Windows, macOS, Linux, Solaris and OpenSolaris.
blueprint.name: VirtualBox
blueprint.title: VirtualBox
